mainEntity.name: What is the Orange or Yellow Screen used for?

acceptedAnswer.text: It shows a warm color background for testing, design previews, or mood lighting.

mainEntity.name: Can it reduce blue light at night?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, orange and yellow tones are gentler on the eyes and can reduce sleep disruption.

mainEntity.name: Can I use it as a light source?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the warm hue can be used as a reading light or ambient glow.

mainEntity.name: Does it work on all devices?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. It runs smoothly on desktop, tablet, and mobile browsers.
